content:
Morning! Have you had breakfast yet?
How about trying my homemade breakfast next time?

content:
Why are you all making such weird faces
when you hear I'm making breakfast?
...I can cook too, you know, Bhan!

content:
It's nice to see you this morning!
What a lovely day.
Where to next, Bhan-bhan~?
